name: Mission
0:
”Alexa, open mission and start cutting the grass”
”Alexa, ask mission the charging status”
”Alexa, open mission and ask it to go to the charging station”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mission
des:
Control your Mission using voice commands!

With this skill you can:
• Start it
• Stop cutting
• Find out about the status
• Find out about the battery level
• Send it back to its base

This skill is compatible with all Mission models.

This is how the Mission skill for Amazon Alexa works:
Start the skill by saying “Alexa, start Mission”. Alexa will tell you all of the commands that you can give to your device. 

You can also send direct voice commands to Mission by starting the skill and immediately giving a command. For example: “Alexa, ask Mission to cut the lawn.” 

You can find a list of available commands below:
• “Alexa, start Mission”
• “Alexa, ask Mission to cut the lawn”
• “Alexa, ask Mission to take a break”
• “Alexa, ask Mission what it’s doing”
• “Alexa, ask Mission what its charging status is”

Please note: 
You will need a Mission model with Wi-Fi, Geo Trace, or Marconi. It must have been made in or after 2016, have up-to-date firmware and be registered with the Mission app.
